articles.title: Amid Backlash to Antisemitic Post, Harvard Professor Resigns as PSC Faculty Adviser, FSJP Member | News - Harvard Crimson
articles.description: Walter Johnson, a professor of History and African and African American Studies, resigned as a faculty adviser to the Harvard Undergraduate Palestine Solidarity Committee and from Faculty and Staff for Justice in Palestine after the groups faced a wave of bac…

articles.author: Nicholas R. Longrich
articles.title: 'Cut down in their prime': Dinosaurs were thriving in Africa before the asteroid hit - Livescience.com
articles.description: The discovery of predatory dinosaurs in marine sediments in Morocco suggests life was abundant and diversifying at the end of the Cretaceous period.
articles.content: 66 million years ago, the last dinosaurs vanished from Earth. We're still trying to understand why. New fossils of abelisaurs —  distant relatives of the tyrannosaurs —  from north Africa suggest tha… [+6505 chars]
